msg.msgText:
The values of the configuration items of the "OAuthProfile" composite object can be viewed by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show OAuthProfile help imaserver show OAuthProfile "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show OAuthProfile "Name=TestOAuthProfile"
The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
